flow.descriptionCdata:
60c39af5-ba9e-4f3a-8abe-bf5e371fce15.06bcfc6c-9a62-4bd8-8d91-4ad399b56ad4.description=260d15ba-f1d8-4034-948e-7066b6d4d6cb.5b61e7c3-5a39-4ee1-b085-4229d3a7ae0f.description 60c39af5-ba9e-4f3a-8abe-bf5e371fce15.08bf120c-1cde-44c0-9904-8b330cbbb470.description=Validates Parameters prior to executing the rest of the workflow. Purpose\: If invalid parameters are supplied the remainder of the workflow cannot run successfully. Inputs\: command - executes ValidateStartorStopOracleDatabase.py Action - Required\: 'start' or 'stop' Database Database Name - Required\:Name of the Oracle database Instance to be Started or Stopped Oracle Home - No description host - Target to run this command against password - Login information for host username - Login information for host protocol - ssh/wmi timeout - Time (ms) before auto-exit\: use ${ExtendedTimeout} to lengthen. Results\: Action - Required\: 'start' or 'stop' Database Database Name - Required\:Name of the Oracle database Instance to be Started or Stopped Oracle Home - No description Exit Code - Exit code of the step needed for branching. 60c39af5-ba9e-4f3a-8abe-bf5e371fce15.89bd985e-e3ea-4cb7-b3f9-07670281bf62.description=260d15ba-f1d8-4034-948e-7066b6d4d6cb.c32dff3e-b063-4d87-9a0a-7f38da742625.description 60c39af5-ba9e-4f3a-8abe-bf5e371fce15.94f9958d-d4b5-4d23-9caa-5e3e2d82bc47.description=Gathers Parameters prior to executing the rest of the workflow. Inputs\: command - executes GatherParametersforStartorStopOracleDatabase.py Action - Required\: 'start' or 'stop' Database Oracle Home - Required\: Location of Oracle Home for Database. Oracle OS User - Required\: Oracle user that owns the ORACLE_HOME on target Database Server. Instance.oracle home - No description Instance.Name - No description Server.Become Routine - No description host - Target to run this command against password - Login information for host username - Login information for host protocol - ssh/wmi timeout - Time (ms) before auto-exit\: use ${ExtendedTimeout} to lengthen. Results\: Action - Required\: 'start' or 'stop' Database Database Name - Required\:Name of the Oracle database Instance to be Started or Stopped Instance Wrapper - Jython call wrapper to run as the Oracle Instance owner. Oracle Home - Location of Oracle Home for Database. Exit Code - Exit code of the step needed for branching. 60c39af5-ba9e-4f3a-8abe-bf5e371fce15.b2da590f-7106-4790-95ec-e69bf272376f.description=Starts the Selected Oracle Database Instance Inputs\: command - executes StartorStopOracleDatabase.py Action - Required\: 'start' or 'stop' Database Call Wrapper - No description Database Name - Required\:Name of the Oracle database Instance to be Started or Stopped Oracle Home - Required\: Location of Oracle Home for Database. host - Target to run this command against password - Login information for host username - Login information for host protocol - ssh/wmi timeout - Time (ms) before auto-exit\: use ${ExtendedTimeout} to lengthen. Results\: Exit Code - Exit code of the step needed for branching. 60c39af5-ba9e-4f3a-8abe-bf5e371fce15.description=
 Usage instructions
The workflow either starts or stops the Oracle database instance based on the Action parameter value in an Oracle Standalone or Grid Standalone environment. 

 Dependencies
Specified Oracle database Instance has already been provisioned.

 Results Verification

The Console will indicate whether the workflow has completed without any errors. The Output tab will indicate whether the start or stop operation of the instance was successful.

To further verify the results\:

\# Log in to the target server.
\# Log in to oracle using command\: su - oracle  
\# Log in to sqlplus using command\: sqlplus / as sysdba
\# set ORACLE_SID using command\: export ORACLE_SID\=(Instance Name) 
\# Run the command\: show parameter instance_name


 Additional Documentation

Additional information, including the _HP Database and Middleware Automation Support Matrix_ and solution pack user guides, are available via HP Live Network\:

"http\://hpln.hp.com/group/database-and-middleware-automation"\:http\://hpln.hp.com/group/database-and-middleware-automation

To access the documentation, click the OTHER FILES link and enter your HP Passport credentials.
 Required Inputs

    Server Target - The desired target to run this flow against.
    Server Target Username - The user to login to the Server Target as.
    Server Target Password - The password to login as the Server Target Username.
    Download Source Host - The target host where the files needed for this flow can be downloaded from.
    Download Source Path - The path to where the files can be found on the Download Source Host.
    Action - Required\: 'start' or 'stop' Database
    Instance.Name - No description
    Instance.oracle home - No description
    Oracle Home - Required\: Location of Oracle Home for Database.
    Oracle OS User - Required\: Oracle user that owns the ORACLE_HOME on target Database Server.
    Server.Become Routine - No description

 Optional Inputs

    Clean Code Base - Remove code base from target after execution (True || False).
    Clean JRE - Remove JRE from target after execution (True || False).
    Debug Level - Set level of output [(least) 1-5 (most)]
60c39af5-ba9e-4f3a-8abe-bf5e371fce15.e65c3c3a-93aa-4008-a83f-bbb9cdcd90f2.description=260d15ba-f1d8-4034-948e-7066b6d4d6cb.6707008f-2c39-4bfd-a503-29e2e3426760.description 60c39af5-ba9e-4f3a-8abe-bf5e371fce15.f37d6b89-4a49-4864-a278-b9d812ec00e1.description=260d15ba-f1d8-4034-948e-7066b6d4d6cb.524643d1-5b7b-4214-8cb9-b0699b6b3864.description
flow.name: Oracle - Start or Stop Database

step.name: Validate Start or Stop Oracle Database
step.resultContextKey: Validate Start or Stop Oracle Database

staticBinding.value: ${openArgs}Action=${action_2};;Call Wrapper=${instanceWrapper};;Database Name=${databaseName_2};;Oracle Home=${oracleHome_2};;Debug Level=${debugLevel};;Server Target=${serverTarget};;Instance Target=${instanceTarget}${closeArgs}

step.name: Gather Parameters for Start or Stop Oracle Database
step.resultContextKey: Gather Parameters for Start or Stop Oracle Databas

staticBinding.value: ${openArgs}Action=${action};;Oracle Home=${oracleHome};;Oracle OS User=${oracleOSUser};;Instance.oracle home=${instance.oracleHome};;Instance.Name=${instanceTarget};;Server.Become Routine=${server.BecomeRoutine};;Debug Level=${debugLevel};;Server Target=${serverTarget};;Instance Target=${instanceTarget}${closeArgs}
